name: Jim's Revenge 2
description:
Controls:
- Right Arrow Key to move right
- Left Arrow  Key to move left
- Up, Z, or X Key to jump
- Space or C to shoot
_____________________________________________     

     Story:
After Jim killed The Big Bad Boss he went home to see his wife. but it turned out the Second In Command killed Jim's wife, now Jim is out for revenge.
_____________________________________________

    Gun Names:
- Mr. Pew (Blue Gun)
- Shooty Mic Shoot (Red Gun)
- Happiness (Green Gun)
- Banana Split (Yellow Gun)
_____________________________________________

     Character Names:
- Jim (Player)
- Wife (Is Dead)
- Enemy (Enemy)
- Second In Command (Boss)

_____________________________________________

     Cheat Codes:
- (at any time in game) hold down J, I, M on the keyboard. if performed correctly a box should appear. Type into the box any of the codes listed bellow.

"shooty mic shoot" = gives you Shooty Mic Shoot (red gun)

"happiness" = gives you Happiness (green gun)

"banana split" = gives you Banana Split (yellow gun)

"infh" = infinit health
